channel.title: Update on 小楼一夜听春雨
channel.description: Recent content in Update on 小楼一夜听春雨

item.title: Fix Users Vip
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 手工修改 VIP 用户数 修改某一天 1 2 testrs:PRIMARY> db.user.update({"vip.level":0, "registerTime" : /20180317/}, {$set: {"vip" : { "level" : 1, "value" : "会员", "createTime" : "20180317010101", "endTime" : "20180417235959" }}}, { multi: 1}) WriteResult({ "nMatched" : 8, "nUpserted" : 0, "nModified" : 8 }) 修改小于某个指

item.title: Mongodb Update
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: mongodb系列之update 只要是批量，后头加 {multi: true} 吧。 批量，新增一个k-v db.Signals_Day.update({TrdDt:20161129}, {$set: {“Real”: true}}, {multi: true}) 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 testrs:PRIMARY> db.Signals_Day.update({TrdDt:20161129}, {$set: {"Real": true}}, {multi: true}) WriteResult({ "nMatched" : 8935, "nUpserted" : 0, "nModified" : 8933 })
